API Documentation

Introduction

Welcome to the Crystal SDK for iOS API documentation.

Crystal is one of the leading social gaming platforms on the iOS platform, serving millions of active users per day.
It provides users and developers with the following premium features:

  • Leaderboards
  • Achievements
  • Challenges
  • Social integration with Facebook and Twitter support
  • Virtual Currencies
  • Virtual Goods
  • Gifting
  • Cross-promotion of Chillingo published games
  • Game Center support

This documentation details the Crystal SDK API's that allows developers to enable these features within their applications.

Installation

Please refer to our extensive developer support documentation for installation instructions and integration within both a standard XCode project as well as a Unity based project.

Release Notes

Please see the Release Notes for the latest Crystal SDK changes as well as changes for previous releases.

Developer Support

For further information regarding Crystal integration as well as FAQ's please visit our developer support documentation.

All other queries should be directed to Crystal Developer Support.
